data.name: Aethyric Shock
data.description: Overwhelms your opponent with power, inflicting X corporeal damage and staggers the for 3 seconds. If the target is afflicted with the Mark of Chaos, they will take Y corporeal damage and be staggered for 6 seconds.

data.name: Alter Fate
data.description: Resurrects all groupmates within 30 feet. Anyone who is brought back from the dead will also be healed for 424 over 9 seconds, and they will deal 20% more damage for 10 seconds.

data.name: Backlash
data.description: Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will lash out for 250 elemental damage over 5 seconds to anyone who hits you.

data.name: Boon of Tzeentch
data.description: Restores X health from your target. If the target is effected by the Mark of Flesh, they will gain 30% increased movement speed for 5 seconds.

data.name: Breath of Tzeentch
data.description: All opponents within 30 feet of you are knocked back, and monsters are knocked down for 2 seconds.

data.name: By Tzeentch's Will!
data.description: Critical direct heals will increase your morale by 200. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Changer's Touch
data.description: Critical attacks and all attacks against Mark of Chaos targets place a debuff on your target that reduces all incoming healing by 50% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Chaotic Agitation
data.description: You channel dark forces into your master ritual dealing X corporeal damage to all enemies within 30 feet of it every seconds for up to 6 seconds.

data.name: Chaotic Blur
data.description: Detaunts targets attack power to 50% for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Chaotic Force
data.description: Your critical damage is increased by +25% against enemies with the Mark of Chaos. Your healing critical chance is increased by 20% against allies with the Mark of Flesh.

data.name: Daemonic Fortitude
data.description: Grants target a X ability bonus to wounds for 60 seconds and then heals the recipient for the amount increased.

data.name: Dark Medicine
data.description: Your target regains X health immediately, and then restores an additional Y health over 5 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Demon Spittle
data.description: Spews a vile mixture over everything 40 feet in front of you, dealing X corporeal damage over 9 seconds to all opponents.

data.name: Discipline
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to willpower.

data.name: Divine Favor
data.description: A strong heal that will restore 1800 health to your target.

data.name: Swirling Vortex
data.description:
Your Mark of Daemonic Furys' activated effect will also apply the Mark of Madness onto the target. Enemies hit by your Master Ritual will be effected by the Mark of Madness. Mark of Madness lasts for 10 seconds and you will deal X% more damage against these targets.

You can no longer cast Tzeentch Shall Remake You, Glimpse of Chaos, Blessing of Chaos, or Dust of Pandemonium.

data.name: Divine Protection
data.description: Each group member within 100 feet is surrounded by a protective shield for the next 10 seconds that will absorb up to 4500 damage from melee abilities.

data.name: Drink Deeply
data.description: Glimpse of Chaos will heal the target for X over 5 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

data.name: Dust of Pandemonium
data.description: All group members within 100 feet of you are healed for X.

data.name: Elixir Of Dark Blessings
data.description: Heals your target for X health. If the target has Mark of Flesh, they will be healed for an additional Y health.

data.name: Embrace the Warp
data.description: You embrace the Warp, surrounding yourself with it's power. You will take only 50% damage and your abilities will cost 25% fewer action points for 10 seconds. During this time you generate almost no threat, and can not be set back while casting.

data.name: Endless Gifts
data.description: Cooldown on Glimpse of Chaos is reduced by 5s and the cost increased by 15 action points.

data.name: Eye of Sheerian
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet gain a 1518 morale bonus to armor and a 579 morale bonus to all resistances for 10 seconds.

data.name: Flash of Chaos
data.description: A burst of chaos that restores X health to an ally.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Glimpse of Chaos
data.note: Target must be Cursed or Hexed
data.description: One curse or hex is removed by the chaos. If the target has Mark of Flesh, one more curse or hex will be dispelled.

data.name: Harbinger of Doom
data.description:
When this ability is toggled on, you are the Harbinger of Doom, converting your healing power, willpower, and healing critical chance bonuses from items into pagic power, intelligence, and magic critical chance.

When this ability is toggled off, you are the Harbinger of Change, converting your magic power, intelligence, and magic critical chance bonuses from items into healing power, willpower, and healing critical chance.

data.name: Leaping Alteration
data.description: A bolt of healing energy which instantly leaps to allies within 30 feet of the last affected, restoring X health over 9 seconds. This effect will only pass through each target once, and will affect up to 6 allies.

data.name: Manipulation
data.description: Any time you directly heal someone, there is a 25% chance your offensive target will take damage equal to 25% of the healed value.

data.name: Mark of Daemonic Fury
data.description:
Grants a groupmember a X ability bonus to strength, ballistic skill, and intelligence. The bearer of this mark may also activate it like an ability to grant Mark of Chaos.
You may only give a player one mark, but players may bear multiple marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Mark of Remaking
data.description:
The groupmember bearing this mark can resurrect themselves if killed in the next 10 minutes. In addition, the bearer's gains a 80 ability bonus to toughness for 1 hour.
You may only give a player one mark, but players may bear multiple marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Mark of the Spell Destroyer
data.description:
Grants a groupmember a X ability bonus to initiative and willpower. The bearer of this mark may activate it like an ability to inflict X Mark of Flesh on an ally.
You may only give a player one mark, but players may bear multiple marks of different types at the same time.

data.name: Mark of the Vortex
data.description:
Grants a groupmember a X ability bonus to all resistances. The bearer of this mark may activate it to inflict Mark of Flesh on an ally.
A player may only bear a single mark at a time, and all of your marks will fade if you die.

data.name: Mirror of Madness
data.description: Apply a 15 second buff to yourself or a groupmate. Every 3 seconds you will deal X corporeal damage to enemies within 30 feet and heal for Y health to allies within 30 feet.

data.name: Rampaging Siphon
data.description: Deals 600 damage to all enemies within 30 feet, and heals group members within 100 feet for the full amount of the damage dealt.

data.name: Restorative Burst
data.description: Any time one of your direct healing effects critically heals an ally, you will regain 40 action points over 3 seconds.

data.name: Rite of Agony
data.description: Pains washes over enemies within 30 feet of your Master Ritual, inflicting X corporeal damage.

data.name: Innervation
data.description: Restores 50 action points to all groupmates within 100 feet of your Master Ritual. This ability is not affected by cooldown reduction.

data.name: Blessing of Chaos
data.description: Heals groupmates within 100 feet of your master ritual for X. In addition, all healing used on them will be +25% more effective for the next 10 seconds.

data.name: Master Ritual
data.note: You may only have 1 Ritual active
data.description: A ritual of dominance that lasts for 20 seconds, healing group members within 100 feet of it for X every 2 seconds and dealing Y corporeal damage to enemies within 30 feet every 2 seconds. These effects are doubled on targets effected by Tzeentch's Cordial and Warp Reality.

data.name: Scourge
data.description: Power lashes out and inflicts X corporeal damage. If the target is effected with the Mark of Chaos, this ability will bypass 50% of their corporeal resistance.

data.name: Warping Rites
data.description: Warp Reality will now deal 20% more damage, and every tick of damage has a 20% chance of making the next Rite of Agony cast within 10 seconds have 50% increased radius and hit up to 15 targets.

data.name: Steal Life
data.description: Your target suffers 900 damage over 9 seconds, and you are healed for a half of the damage dealt.

data.name: Storm of Ravens
data.description: Deals X corporeal damage to target and all enemies within 30 feet. Up to 9 allies within 30 feet of the target will be healed for Y.

data.name: Suppressing The Fragile Unbelievers
data.description: You silence disbelievers and inflict 1218 damage over 7 seconds within 30 feet around you.

data.name: Sweeping Disgorgement
data.description: Demon Spittle grows ever more corrosive and now causes enemies to take a X unique penalty to armor and a Y unique penalty to corporeal resistance.

data.name: Transference
data.description: The cooldown on Harbinger of Doom is now 10 seconds. While under the effects of your Harbinger of Doom; each time you deal direct damage, your defensive target is healed for 50% of the damage dealt. While under the effects of your Harringer of Change, the cast times of your Path of Panedmonium abilities will be reduced by 25%.

data.name: Tzeentch Shall Remake You
data.description: Tzeentch dislikes losing a pawn so soon. Your target is resurrected with 20% health so that Tzeentch may continue his game.

data.name: Tzeentch's Cordial
data.description: Heals your target for X every 2 seconds for 20 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Cry
data.description: A quick bolt of power that deals X corporeal damage.

data.name: Tzeentch's Grip
data.description: Direct heals you cast have a 25% chance to create a shield on your target that can absorb up to X damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Lash
data.description: Inflicts X corporeal damage over 4 seconds and silences the target, preventing them from using any magic.

data.name: Tzeentch's Refreshment
data.description: While under the ffects of Harbinger of Doom, your abilities will cost 25% less action points. While under the effects of your Harbinger of Change, direct heals you cast have a 25% chance to grant your target 50 AP, but will not restore AP to yourself.

data.name: Tzeentch's Scream
data.description: All groupmates within 100 feet are healed for 2394 health over 15 seconds and regain 25 action points every second for 15 seconds

data.name: Tzeentch's Shielding
data.description: All group mates within 100 feet are granted 250 Action Points, and for 20 seconds, everyone will absorb up to 5400 damage.

data.name: Tzeentch's Talon
data.description: Your target takes a 1320 morale penalty to armor and a 504 morale penalty to all resistances for 15 seconds.

data.name: Tzeentch's Warding
data.description: Gaina  252 unique bonus to elemental resistance.

data.name: Veil of Chaos
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your target will absorb up to X damage. If they are under the effect of Mark of Flesh, when the effect fades they will regain Y health.

data.name: Warp Reality
data.description: Inflicts X corporeal damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Warped Flesh
data.description:
Any time you are attacked, there is a 25% chance that you will absorb up to 375 damage.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Warping The Spirit
data.description: Each tick of Tzeentch's Cordial has 25% chance to give the target a 1056 unique bonus to armor for 10 seconds. Additionally, 10% less armor will be bypassed when they are attacked.

data.name: Wind of Insanity
data.description:
You securely root yourself in place to call fourth ferocious winds for up to 6 seconds that inflict X corporeal damage every second to targets within 30 feet of you. The fierce winds will knock back players a short distance without granting them immunity, and will knock down monsters for 2 seconds. Targets cannot be knocked back more than once every 1.5 seconds.
This spell may be toggled off to regain your movement.

data.name: Windblock
data.description: Inflicts 1800 damage to all targets within 30 feet of you, making heals 50% less effective on them for 10 seconds.
